26.ara-name: كتاب الأشربة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Jabir bin ‘Abdullah : "The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) prohibited using (certain) containers. So the Ansar complained about that to him. They said: 'We will have no vessels!' so he said: 'If so then use them.'" He said: There are narrations on this topic from Ibn Mas'ud, Abu Hurairah, Abu Sa'eed, and 'Abdullah bin 'Amr. [Abu 'Eisa said:] This Hadith is Hasan Sahih

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الرُّخْصَةِ أَنْ يُنْبَذَ فِي الظُّرُوفِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related Permitting That Nabidh Be Prepared Ibn Containers
